description: This file defines a mock class for OvsDbApiInterface used in testing, including virtual methods for database operations and mocking functions, along with necessary includes and interface class definitions.

classes.name: OvsDbApiInterface
classes.description: Interface class defining virtual methods for OVS database operations, intended for mocking and testing.

classes.name: OvsDbApiMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of OvsDbApiInterface, using Google Mock to facilitate unit testing of components depending on OvsDbApi.

methods.name: ovsdb_init
methods.description: Initialize the OVS database with a given unsigned integer parameter.

methods.name: ovsdb_deinit
methods.description: Deinitialize or shut down the OVS database.

methods.name: ovsdb_write
methods.description: Write data into the OVS database with specified table configuration and receipt callback.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor
methods.description: Set up a monitor on the specified OVS table with callbacks for monitoring.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor_cancel
methods.description: Cancel an existing monitor on the specified OVS table.

methods.name: ovsdb_delete
methods.description: Delete entries from the specified OVS table with provided identifiers.
